TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TextPattern extends System.Windows.Automation.BasePattern

summary.span: 代表包含文字的控制項。

span.span: Represents controls that contain text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別可能不會提供如只存在於特定的使用者介面自動化提供者的文字功能。The class may not provide for text features that exist only in a particular UI Automation provider. 如需這些獨特且通常進階的功能，類別會提供使用者介面自動化用戶端存取對應的原生物件模型的方法。For these unique and often advanced features, the class provides methods for a UI Automation client to access the corresponding native object model.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly AnimationStyleAttribute As AutomationTextAttribute

summary.span: 識別文字範圍的 屬性。

span.span: Identifies the attribute of a text range.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 僅限螢幕上出現的動畫動畫的文字列印，但動畫並不會生效。Animations appear on the screen only; the animated text prints, but the animation effect does not. 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式會使用這個識別項。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自動化提供者應該使用中的對等欄位。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . UI 自動化用戶端取得屬性的值，藉由呼叫。UI Automation clients get the value of the attribute by calling . 這個屬性的值屬於型別。Values for this attribute are of type . 預設值是 。The default value is . ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何取得 Microsoft 記事本 」 中的文字範圍的屬性值。The following example shows how to obtain an attribute value for a range of text in Microsoft Notepad. > [!NOTE] > Microsoft 記事本作為文字提供者，例如之用。Microsoft Notepad is used as the text provider for example purposes only. Microsoft 記事本並非支援所要求的屬性值。Microsoft Notepad is not guaranteed to support the attribute value being requested. MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly CultureAttribute As AutomationTextAttribute

summary.span: 識別文字範圍的 () 屬性，細分到附屬語言層級，例如瑞士法文 (fr-CH) 而非法文 (fr)。

span.span: Identifies the () attribute of a text range down to the sub-language level; for example, French–Switzerland (fr-CH) instead of French (fr).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式會使用這個識別項。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自動化提供者應該使用中的對等欄位。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . UI 自動化用戶端取得屬性的值，藉由呼叫。UI Automation clients get the value of the attribute by calling . 這個屬性的值屬於型別。Values for this attribute are of type . 預設值是應用程式使用者介面的語言。The default value is the language of the application user interface. 請參閱的語言代碼格式的其他詳細資料。See for more detail on the language code format. > [!NOTE] > 可能有伺服器不支援語言標記，或作者不能使用它。There might be cases where the server does not support the language tag or authors cannot use it. 在這些情況下會套用預設值。In those cases the default applies. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何取得 Microsoft 記事本 」 中的文字範圍的屬性值。The following example shows how to obtain an attribute value for a range of text in Microsoft Notepad. > [!NOTE] > Microsoft 記事本作為文字提供者，例如之用。Microsoft Notepad is used as the text provider for example purposes only. Microsoft 記事本並非支援所要求的屬性值。Microsoft Notepad is not guaranteed to support the attribute value being requested. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DocumentRange As TextPatternRange

summary.span: 取得包含文件主要文字的文字範圍。

span.span: Gets a text range that encloses the main text of a document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可能不會包含一些輔助的文字，例如標頭、 註腳或註解。Some auxiliary text such as headers, footnotes, or annotations might not be included. ## Examples 在下列程式碼範例中，是 targetTextPattern 成員變數取自感興趣的文字提供者的物件。In the following code example, the targetTextPattern member variable is a object obtained from a text provider of interest. UI 自動化提供者應該使用中的對等欄位。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . UI 自動化用戶端取得屬性的值，藉由呼叫。UI Automation clients get the value of the attribute by calling . 這個屬性的值屬於型別。Values for this attribute are of type . 預設值是`empty string`。The default value is an `empty string`. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何取得 Microsoft 記事本 」 中的文字範圍的屬性值。The following example shows how to obtain an attribute value for a range of text in Microsoft Notepad. > [!NOTE] > Microsoft 記事本作為文字提供者，例如之用。Microsoft Notepad is used as the text provider for example purposes only. Microsoft 記事本並非支援所要求的屬性值。Microsoft Notepad is not guaranteed to support the attribute value being requested. MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly FontWeightAttribute As AutomationTextAttribute

summary.span: 識別文字範圍的 屬性。

span.span: Identifies the attribute of a text range.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會參考相對的筆劃、 粗細、 或的字型粗細。This attribute refers to the relative stroke, thickness, or boldness of a font. 這個屬性以模型`lfWeight`欄位[GDI LOGFONT](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/gdi/fontext_1wmq.asp)。This attribute is modeled after the `lfWeight` field in [GDI LOGFONT](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/gdi/fontext_1wmq.asp). 為了保持一致性，下列的值已採用 LOGFONT 從： 0 = DontCare，100 = 細，200 = ExtraLight 或 UltraLight，300 = 光線，400 = Normal 或 Regular，500 = 中，600 = SemiBold 或 DemiBold，700 = 粗體，800 = ExtraBold 或 UltraBold，以及 900 = 繁重或黑色。For consistency, the following values have been adopted from LOGFONT: 0=DontCare, 100=Thin, 200=ExtraLight or UltraLight, 300=Light, 400=Normal or Regular, 500=Medium, 600=SemiBold or DemiBold, 700=Bold, 800=ExtraBold or UltraBold, and 900=Heavy or Black. 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式會使用這個識別項。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自動化提供者應該使用中的對等欄位。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . UI 自動化用戶端取得屬性的值，藉由呼叫。UI Automation clients get the value of the attribute by calling . 這個屬性的值屬於型別。Values for this attribute are of type . 預設值是 `zero`。The default value is `zero`. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何取得 Microsoft 記事本 」 中的文字範圍的屬性值。The following example shows how to obtain an attribute value for a range of text in Microsoft Notepad. > [!NOTE] > Microsoft 記事本作為文字提供者，例如之用。Microsoft Notepad is used as the text provider for example purposes only. Microsoft 記事本並非支援所要求的屬性值。Microsoft Notepad is not guaranteed to support the attribute value being requested. [!code-csharp[UIATextPattern_snip#1008](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/CSharp/SearchWindow.cs#1008)] [!code-vb[UIATextPattern_snip#2008](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/VisualBasic/SearchWindow.vb#2008)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性的值相當於文字或字型色彩。The value of this attribute is equivalent to the text or font color. 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式會使用這個識別項。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自動化提供者應該使用中的對等欄位。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . UI 自動化用戶端取得屬性的值，藉由呼叫。UI Automation clients get the value of the attribute by calling . 這個屬性的值屬於型別。Values for this attribute are of type . 預設值是 `zero`。The default value is `zero`. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何取得 Microsoft 記事本 」 中的文字範圍的屬性值。The following example shows how to obtain an attribute value for a range of text in Microsoft Notepad. > [!NOTE] > Microsoft 記事本作為文字提供者，例如之用。Microsoft Notepad is used as the text provider for example purposes only. Microsoft 記事本並非支援所要求的屬性值。Microsoft Notepad is not guaranteed to support the attribute value being requested. [!code-csharp[UIATextPattern_snip#1009](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/CSharp/SearchWindow.cs#1009)] [!code-vb[UIATextPattern_snip#2009](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/VisualBasic/SearchWindow.vb#2009)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange[] GetSelection() cil managed

summary.span: 擷取與目前文字選取範圍關聯之斷續文字範圍的集合。

span.span: Retrieves a collection of disjoint text ranges associated with the current text selection or selections.
A collection of disjoint text ranges.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果沒有選取文字，系統資料指標的位置 （文字插入點） 會傳回變質文字範圍 （空白範圍）。If no text is selected, returns the degenerate text range (empty range) at the position of the system cursor (text insertion point). 如果系統游標 （文字插入點） 不存在，可能會傳回`null`。If the system cursor (text insertion point) is not present, might return `null`. > [!NOTE] > 使用屬性來測試控制項支援文字選取項目或文字插入點的位置，則為。Use the property to test if text selection or positioning of the text insertion point is supported by the control. ## Examples [!code-csharp[UIATextPattern_snip#1046](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/CSharp/SearchWindow.cs#1046)] [!code-vb[UIATextPattern_snip#2046](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/VisualBasic/SearchWindow.vb#2046)]

exception.span: 文字容器不支援文字選取範圍。

span.span: The text container does not support text selection.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange[] GetVisibleRanges() cil managed

summary.span: 從文字容器擷取斷續文字範圍的陣列，其中每一個文字範圍都以第一個局部可見行開頭，一直到最後一個局部可見行的尾端為止。

span.span: Retrieves an array of disjoint text ranges from a text container where each text range begins with the first partially visible line through to the end of the last partially visible line.

returns.span: 容器內可見文字範圍的集合或空陣列。

span.span: The collection of visible text ranges within the container or an empty array.
is never returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 斷續的文字範圍重疊的視窗或其他物件時，被遮蔽文字容器的任何內容時或多個資料行配置的文字容器有一或多個資料行部分捲動到檢視可能會發生。Disjoint text ranges may occur when any content of a text container is obscured by an overlapping window or other object, or when a text container with a multi-column layout has one or more columns partially scrolled out of view. 如果沒有文字為可見，則會傳回變質 （空的） 文字範圍。If no text is visible, a degenerate (empty) text range is returned. 如果是空的文字容器或所有文字都捲動到檢視時，可能會傳回這個空的範圍。This empty range can be returned if the text container is empty or when all text is scrolled out of view. ## Examples [!code-csharp[UIATextPattern_snip#VisibleRanges](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/CSharp/SearchWindow.cs#visibleranges)] [!code-vb[UIATextPattern_snip#VisibleRanges](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/VisualBasic/SearchWindow.vb#visibleranges)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly HorizontalTextAlignmentAttribute As AutomationTextAttribute

summary.span: 識別文字範圍的 屬性。

span.span: Identifies the attribute of a text range.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性代表套用至呼叫端文字範圍相關聯的段落的水平文字對齊方式。This attribute represents the horizontal text alignment applied to the paragraph(s) associated with the calling text range. 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式會使用這個識別項。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自動化提供者應該使用中的對等欄位。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . UI 自動化用戶端取得屬性的值，藉由呼叫。UI Automation clients get the value of the attribute by calling . 這個屬性的值屬於型別。Values for this attribute are of type . 預設值為 The default value is ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何取得 Microsoft 記事本 」 中的文字範圍的屬性值。The following example shows how to obtain an attribute value for a range of text in Microsoft Notepad. > [!NOTE] > Microsoft 記事本作為文字提供者，例如之用。Microsoft Notepad is used as the text provider for example purposes only. Microsoft 記事本並非支援所要求的屬性值。Microsoft Notepad is not guaranteed to support the attribute value being requested. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性代表以點為單位的開頭縮排 () 套用到呼叫端文字範圍相關聯的段落。This attribute represents the leading indentation in points () applied to the paragraph(s) associated with the calling text range. 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式會使用這個識別項。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自動化提供者應該使用中的對等欄位。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . UI 自動化用戶端取得屬性的值，藉由呼叫。UI Automation clients get the value of the attribute by calling . 這個屬性的值屬於型別。Values for this attribute are of type . 預設值是 `zero`。The default value is `zero`. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何取得 Microsoft 記事本 」 中的文字範圍的屬性值。The following example shows how to obtain an attribute value for a range of text in Microsoft Notepad. > [!NOTE] > Microsoft 記事本作為文字提供者，例如之用。Microsoft Notepad is used as the text provider for example purposes only. Microsoft 記事本並非支援所要求的屬性值。Microsoft Notepad is not guaranteed to support the attribute value being requested. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性代表與呼叫端文字範圍相關聯的文件的唯讀狀態。This attribute represents the read-only state of the document associated with the calling text range. > [!NOTE] > 如果文件或檔案是唯讀的但您仍然可以編輯它，並將它儲存為另一個檔案，將文字不是唯讀狀態。If a document or file is read-only, but you can still edit it and save it as another file, the text is not considered read-only. 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式會使用這個識別項。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自動化提供者應該使用中的對等欄位。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . UI 自動化用戶端取得屬性的值，藉由呼叫。UI Automation clients get the value of the attribute by calling . 這個屬性的值屬於型別。Values for this attribute are of type . 預設值是 `false`。The default value is `false`. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何取得 Microsoft 記事本 」 中的文字範圍的屬性值。The following example shows how to obtain an attribute value for a range of text in Microsoft Notepad. > [!NOTE] > Microsoft 記事本作為文字提供者，例如之用。Microsoft Notepad is used as the text provider for example purposes only. Public Function RangeFromChild (childElement As AutomationElement) As TextPatternRange

span.span: The enclosed object.

summary.span: 擷取包含子項目 (例如影像、超連結、[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xl](~/includes/tlasharptla-xl-md.md)] 試算表或其他內嵌物件) 的文字範圍。

span.span: Retrieves a text range enclosing a child element such as an image, hyperlink, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xl](~/includes/tlasharptla-xl-md.md)] spreadsheet, or other embedded object.
A range that spans the child element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果子項目所在的範圍中沒有任何文字，則會傳回變質 （空的） 的範圍。If there is no text in the range where the child element exists, a degenerate (empty) range is returned. `childElement`參數是其中一個子系聯或從子系的陣列。The `childElement` parameter is either a child of the associated with a or from the array of children of a . ## Examples [!code-csharp[UIATextPattern_snip#GetTextElement](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/CSharp/SearchWindow.cs#gettextelement)] [!code-vb[UIATextPattern_snip#GetTextElement](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/VisualBasic/SearchWindow.vb#gettextelement)] [!code-csharp[UIATextPattern_snip#GetRangeFromChild](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/CSharp/SearchWindow.cs#getrangefromchild)] [!code-vb[UIATextPattern_snip#GetRangeFromChild](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/VisualBasic/SearchWindow.vb#getrangefromchild)]

span.span: The child element is .

exception.span: 項目不是文字容器的子系。

span.span: The element is not a child of the text container.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange RangeFromPoint(valuetype System.Windows.Point screenLocation) cil managed
Public Function RangeFromPoint (screenLocation As Point) As TextPatternRange

span.span: The location in screen coordinates.

summary.span: 傳回最接近指定之螢幕座標的變質 (空) 文字範圍。

span.span: Returns the degenerate (empty) text range nearest to the specified screen coordinates.

returns.span: 最接近指定位置的變質範圍。

span.span: A degenerate range nearest the specified location.
is never returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 螢幕座標的影像，座標內時，會傳回包裝子物件的文字範圍的超連結，[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xl](~/includes/tlasharptla-xl-md.md)]試算表或其他內嵌的物件。A text range that wraps a child object is returned if the screen coordinates are within the coordinates of an image, hyperlink, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xl](~/includes/tlasharptla-xl-md.md)] spreadsheet, or other embedded object. 因為隱藏的文字不會忽略，則會傳回變質範圍從最接近指定位置的可見文字。Because hidden text is not ignored by , a degenerate range from the visible text closest to the given point is returned. ## Examples [!code-csharp[UIATextPattern_snip#1049](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/CSharp/SearchWindow.cs#1049)] [!code-vb[UIATextPattern_snip#1049](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/VisualBasic/SearchWindow.vb#1049)]

exception.span: 指定點超出文字模式關聯的 之外。

span.span: A given point is outside the associated with the text pattern.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly StrikethroughColorAttribute As AutomationTextAttribute

summary.span: 識別文字範圍的 屬性。

span.span: Identifies the attribute of a text range.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式會使用這個識別項。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自動化提供者應該使用中的對等欄位。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . UI 自動化用戶端取得屬性的值，藉由呼叫。UI Automation clients get the value of the attribute by calling . 這個屬性的值屬於型別。Values for this attribute are of type . 預設值是 `zero`。The default value is `zero`. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何取得 Microsoft 記事本 」 中的文字範圍的屬性值。The following example shows how to obtain an attribute value for a range of text in Microsoft Notepad. > [!NOTE] > Microsoft 記事本作為文字提供者，例如之用。Microsoft Notepad is used as the text provider for example purposes only. Microsoft 記事本並非支援所要求的屬性值。Microsoft Notepad is not guaranteed to support the attribute value being requested. summary.span: 識別文字範圍的 屬性。

span.span: Identifies the attribute of a text range.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性代表以點為單位的定位停駐點的集合 ()。This attribute represents the collection of tab stops in points (). 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式會使用這個識別項。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自動化提供者應該使用中的對等欄位。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . UI 自動化用戶端取得屬性的值，藉由呼叫。UI Automation clients get the value of the attribute by calling . 這個屬性的值為類型的陣列。Values for this attribute are an array of type . 預設值是`empty`陣列。The default value is an `empty` array. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何取得 Microsoft 記事本 」 中的文字範圍的屬性值。The following example shows how to obtain an attribute value for a range of text in Microsoft Notepad. > [!NOTE] > Microsoft 記事本作為文字提供者，例如之用。Microsoft Notepad is used as the text provider for example purposes only. Microsoft 記事本並非支援所要求的屬性值。Microsoft Notepad is not guaranteed to support the attribute value being requested. MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationEvent TextSelectionChangedEvent
Public Shared ReadOnly TextSelectionChangedEvent As AutomationEvent

summary.span: 識別修改文字選取範圍時所引發的事件。

span.span: Identifies the event raised when the text selection is modified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些文字控制項處理為零寬度的文字選取範圍的文字插入點 （游標），並可能會引發`TextSelectionChangedEvent`游標移動時。Some text controls handle the text insertion point (cursor) as a zero-width text selection and might raise `TextSelectionChangedEvent` when the cursor is moved. > [!NOTE] > 若要依照資料指標移動，使用者介面自動化用戶端建議保留追蹤所接聽的相對應的插入點變更[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]項目事件，而不是取決於。To follow cursor movements, UI Automation clients are advised to keep track of insertion point changes by listening for corresponding [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element events rather than depending on . 這個識別碼由使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式使用者介面自動化提供者應使用中的對等欄位。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . ## Examples [!code-csharp[FindText#SelectionChanged](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FindText/CSharp/SearchWindow.cs#selectionchanged)] [!code-vb[FindText#SelectionChanged](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FindText/VisualBasic/SearchWindow.vb#selectionchanged)]
